author: sergio.sp
title: CARDANO SCAMWATCH TASK FORCE
description: The means of viralization of the rumor have changed. Today fake news spreads like wildfire, through multiple insecure points of influence.
solution: Implement a discord support network and a data mining script to identify bots on twitter, and thus coordinate anti-defamation campaigns.
experience:
7 years of experience in Electoral Marketing
